page.title: 18TELEVISION & 11 YEAR OLDS
page.content: We have done a survey about television.We have found out that: Most people prefer to watch Tyne Tees Television than any other channel available.Only two people from 25 preferred to watch BBC1 and BBC2. Most people watched television for 5 hours a day,but some people watch it for 8 hours. The most popular programmes were Coronation Street (a soapopera) and Minder(a crime comedy).The most popular cartoon was Dungeons And Dragons,(fantasy adventure). The most popular films were Ghostbusters,Return Of The Jedi and Rocky 3.Nowadays people are able to watch films in the house because, of recently invented video recorders and cable T.V.
